SENDDATACLEAR&#013--******************&#013-- Write the samplecount&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0012 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0013 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0014 08 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0015 02 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0016 16 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0017 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0018 00 --Data &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0059 00 LASTBYTE&#013--Interframe Gap Time: 1000 ns&#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 0060 &#013-- Sample Count&#013-- Modifer: IncLimit 01&#013-- 0ffset 6 dec-&#076 6 hex&#013-- datawidth 0016&#013-- XthFrame 0000 &#013-- XthFrameOffset 0000&#013-- Endvalue 3999dec -&#076 0F9Fhex&#013-- StartValue 0&#013ETH PORTX SENDMODIFY 01 0011 0016 000e 0000 0F9F 0000&#013WAIT FOR ns 100&#013-- Release 9-2 local frame and SampleSync:&#013-- Writing a 0 is not in sync and release local 9-2 frame&#013-- Writing a 1 is in sync and realease local 9-2 frame&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0074 EE &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0075 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0076 08 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0077 02 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0078 12 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0079 00
